DIA_11271_Citizen_HELLORefugee_03_01: You come to pray to Adanos?
DIA_11271_Citizen_HELLORefugee_03_02: Forget it! He only listens to good, hardworking people!
DIA_11271_Citizen_HELLORefugee_03_03: If you want to be someone in this city, you have to show it with actions first and foremost!
DIA_11271_Citizen_AfterHello_03_01: Prove yourself worthy to live here and maybe Adanos will listen to you!
